detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication package¶

Submodules¶

detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication.AndorControl module¶

class detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication.AndorControl.AndorControl[source]¶
  • Readout modes
    • Full Vertical Binning (FVB)
    • Single Track
    • Multi Track
    • Random Track
    • Image
    • Cropped
  • Acquisition modes

    • Single scan

    • Accumulate

    • Kinetic series

    • Run till abort

    • Fast kinetics

      Single acquisition structure:

      FVB, single scan, then GetAcquiredData

DRV_GENERAL_ERRORS = 20049¶
DRV_SUCCESS = 20002¶

detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication.AndorControl2 module¶

detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication.AndorIdus module¶

Module to control Andor idus camera and Shamrock 303i spectrograph

This code is based on code from David Baddeley, Hamid Ohadi and Martijn Schaafsma

class detectors.spectrometers.andor.communication.AndorIdus.AndorIdus[source]¶

Provides functions to control Andor Idus camera and spectrograph For extensive documentation and specs see Andor SDK manual

set_acquisition_mode(mode)[source]¶

Set acquisition mode (1 = single scan, 2 = accumulate, 3 = kinetics, 4 = fast kinetics, 5 = run till abort).

SetShutter(typ, mode, closingtime, openingtime)[source]¶

Set the configuration for the shutter

Input:
typ (int) : 0/1 Output TTL low/high signal to open shutter mode (int) : 0/1/2 For Auto/Open/Close closingtime (int) : millisecs it takes to close openingtime (int) : millisecs it takes to open
Output:
None
SetShutterEx(typ, mode, closingtime, openingtime, extmode)[source]¶

Set the configuration for the shutter in external mode

Input:
typ (int) : 0/1 Output TTL low/high signal to open shutter mode (int) : 0/1/2 For Auto/Open/Close closingtime (int) : millisecs it takes to close openingtime (int) : millisecs it takes to open extmode (int) : 0/1/2 For Auto/Open/Close
Output:
None
